Component.label: Password

StringProperty.label: Password Size
StringProperty.Description: The number of characters of the randomly generated password.

IntegerProperty.label: Minimum Lower Case Characters
IntegerProperty.Description: The minimum number of lowercase characters that the password must include.

IntegerProperty.label: Minimum Upper Case Characters
IntegerProperty.Description: The minimum number of uppercase characters that the password must include.

IntegerProperty.label: Minimum Digits
IntegerProperty.Description: The minimum number of digits that the password must include.

IntegerProperty.label: Minimum Special Characters
IntegerProperty.Description: The minimum number of special characters that the password must include.

StringProperty.label: Special Characters
StringProperty.Description: The set of special characters from which the password generator could choose, without separator, for instance: (){}[]-_+*=

Component.Description: The password component is able to randomly generate a password having a specified length.
